form.label: Zeek DPD (V3.2)
form.description: V3 Additions: Dashboard Now Integrates Drilldown

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.DPD by DPD.analyzer, DPD.src_ip, DPD.dest_ip, DPD.dest_port, DPD.failure_reason | rename DPD.analyzer AS analyzer, DPD.src_ip AS src_ip, DPD.dest_ip AS dest_ip, DPD.dest_port AS dest_port, DPD.failure_reason AS failure_reason

done.set: | eval dest_port=tonumber(dest_port) | appendpipe [where dest_port > 1024 | eval dest_port = "High Port"] | mvexpand dest_port | where (dest_port < tonumber(1025) OR dest_port = "High Port")
| rex field=src_ip "(?<orig_subnet>\d+\.\d+)\.\d+\.\d+" | eval orig_subnet=orig_subnet + ".0.0/16" | rex field=dest_ip "(?<resp_subnet>\d+\.\d+)\.\d+\.\d+" | eval resp_subnet=resp_subnet + ".0.0/16"

| appendpipe [where like (failure_reason, "Binpac exception:%")| eval failure_reason="Binpac exception"] | appendpipe [where like (failure_reason, "Invalid version late in TLS connection%")| eval failure_reason="Invalid version late in TLS connection"] | appendpipe [where like (failure_reason, "not a http request line")| eval failure_reason="Invalid HTTP request"] | appendpipe [where like (failure_reason, "not a http reply line")| eval failure_reason="Invalid HTTP reply"] | mvexpand failure_reason | where !like (failure_reason, "Binpac exception:%") AND !like (failure_reason, "not a http request line") AND !like (failure_reason, "Invalid version late in TLS connection.%") AND !like (failure_reason, "not a http reply line")

| sort by -count | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "Instance"="No Instances Found" | table Instance] | rename analyzer AS "Detected Protocol", orig_subnet AS "Source CIDR16", resp_subnet AS "Destination CIDR16", dest_port AS "Destination Port", failure_reason AS "Failure Reason", count AS Count, dest_ip AS "Destination IP", src_ip AS "Source IP"

search.query:
| where like (analyzer, $analyzer|s$)
$SimpleFail$
| stats count by analyzer, failure_reason
$Format$

| where like (analyzer, $analyzer|s$)
$HighPort$
$CIDR16$
$SimpleFail$
| where like (failure_reason, $failreason|s$)
| stats count by analyzer, orig_subnet, resp_subnet, failure_reason
$Format$

| where like (analyzer, $analyzer|s$)
$HighPort$
$CIDR16$
$SimpleFail$
| where like (failure_reason, $failreason|s$)

| stats count by analyzer, src_ip, dest_ip, dest_port, failure_reason
